patterns: Which items do you have?
What kinds of items are there?
What do you sell?
What second-hand products do you have?
responses: We sell a variety of second-hand products including textbooks, electronics, furniture, and clothing.
We have textbooks, electronics, furniture, clothing, and more.

patterns: Do you take credit cards?
Do you accept Mastercard?
Can I pay with Paypal?
Are you cash only?
What payment methods are available?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard, PayPal, and cash on delivery.
We accept most major credit cards, and PayPal.
You can pay using VISA, Mastercard, PayPal, or cash on delivery.

patterns: How long does delivery take?
How long does shipping take?
When do I get my delivery?
What is the delivery time for orders?
responses: Delivery will be based on the negotiation between buyer and seller.

patterns: What is the return policy?
Can I return a product?
How do returns work?
What if I am not satisfied with my purchase?
responses: There is no return policy for now in the future we will seeking to adopt return policy.

patterns: How can I sell my items?
What is the process to sell something?
How do I list a product for sale?
I want to sell my stuff, how do I do that?
responses: To sell an item, click on 'Sell' in the top menu, fill out the product details, and submit.
You can list your product by clicking 'Sell' and providing the necessary information about your item.

patterns: What protection do I have as a buyer?
Is there buyer protection?
How am I protected when buying?
What if I receive a faulty product?
responses: We offer a buyer protection policy that ensures you get a refund if the product is faulty or not as described.
As a buyer, you're protected with our refund policy in case the product does not meet your expectations.

patterns: How can I contact support?
I need help, how can I reach you?
Is there customer support?
How do I get in touch with customer service?
responses: You can contact our support team via email at ramestgupta1234@gmail.com or call us at 6388099423.
For any assistance, please reach out to our customer support at ramestgupta1234@gmail.com or 6388099423.

patterns: What is the condition of the items?
Are the products new or used?
Can you tell me about the product condition?
How do I know the condition of the product?
responses: All products are second-hand but are in good condition. Each listing includes a detailed description of the item's condition.
Our products are pre-owned. Sellers provide detailed descriptions and images to show the condition of each item.

patterns: What is the shipping cost?
How much does delivery cost?
Is there a shipping fee?
Do I have to pay for delivery?
responses: Shipping is free for all orders over $50. For orders under $50, a small shipping fee applies.
Delivery costs vary based on the item and location. Please check the shipping cost at checkout.

patterns: How do I track my order?
Can I track my delivery?
Where is my order?
Track my shipment
responses: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section.
Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email.

patterns: I am trying to log in as an admin
How do I log in as a buyer?
I need help with admin login
Can you assist me with buyer login?
How can I access the admin panel?
How do I log into my buyer account?
responses: For admin login, please enter your admin credentials on the login page. If you need help, contact support.
To log in as a buyer, please enter your email and password on the buyer login page. Need assistance? I'm here to help.
Having trouble logging in as an admin? Make sure your credentials are correct, or reset your password if needed.
If you're trying to log in as a buyer, ensure your email and password are correct. You can reset your password if you've forgotten it.
Accessing the admin panel requires admin credentials. If you need help, contact support or reset your password.
To access your buyer account, use your registered email and password. Need help? I'm here to assist you.

patterns: How do I create an account?
Can I sign up as a new user?
How do I register?
I want to create a new account
responses: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right corner and fill in your details.
You can register as a new user by clicking on 'Sign Up' and providing the necessary information.

patterns: How can I update my profile?
I want to change my profile details
How do I edit my account information?
Can I update my contact information?
responses: To update your profile, log in to your account, go to 'My Profile', and make the necessary changes.
You can edit your account information by visiting the 'My Profile' section after logging in.

patterns: How can I give feedback?
I want to provide feedback
Where can I leave a review?
How do I share my experience?
responses: We'd love to hear your feedback! You can leave a review or share your experience in the 'Feedback' section.
To provide feedback, please visit the 'Feedback' section and fill out the form.

patterns: I have a problem with my transaction
What if there is an issue with my payment?
I need help with a payment issue
My payment didn't go through
responses: If you encounter any issues with your transaction, please contact our support team immediately.
For any payment-related issues, reach out to our customer support at ramestgupta1234@gmail.com or call 6388099423.

patterns: I am having trouble listing my product
My product is not showing up
How can I fix issues with my listing?
My item isn't listed properly
responses: If you're having trouble listing your product, ensure all required fields are filled out correctly. Contact support if the issue persists.
Make sure your product details are complete and accurate. If your item isn't showing up, please contact our support team.

patterns: How can I secure my account?
What should I do if my account is hacked?
How do I change my password?
How can I enable two-factor authentication?
responses: To secure your account, use a strong password and change it regularly. You can also enable two-factor authentication in your account settings.
If you suspect your account has been hacked, change your password immediately and contact support.
To change your password, go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Change Password'.
You can enable two-factor authentication by visiting 'Account Settings' and selecting 'Security'.

patterns: How can I resolve a dispute with a seller?
What do I do if I have an issue with a buyer?
How are disputes handled?
I need help with a transaction dispute
responses: If you have a dispute, please contact our support team with the details. We will mediate to help resolve the issue.
For disputes with buyers or sellers, reach out to our support team. We aim to resolve disputes fairly and promptly.

patterns: Is there a pickup point on campus?
How do I find sellers within my college?
Can I meet the seller on campus?
What are the on-campus delivery options?
responses: Yes, there is a designated pickup point on campus. Please check the 'Campus Pickup' section for details.
You can find sellers within your college by filtering search results to show on-campus listings only.
Meeting the seller on campus is an option. Coordinate the details through the messaging feature.
On-campus delivery options vary. Please check the 'Delivery Options' section for more information.

patterns: Is this item still available?
Can I check if an item is available?
How do I know if a product is in stock?
Is the product still in stock?
responses: You can check the availability of an item on the product listing page. If it's available, there will be an option to purchase.
To see if an item is available, visit the product listing page. It will indicate if the item is in stock.

patterns: Can I negotiate the price?
Is the price negotiable?
How do I bargain with the seller?
Can I offer a different price?
responses: Yes, you can negotiate the price with the seller using the messaging feature on the product listing page.
To negotiate the price, contact the seller directly through the messaging system and discuss your offer.

patterns: Can I buy in bulk?
Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?
How do I place a bulk order?
Is there a discount for buying multiple items?
responses: For bulk purchases, please contact the seller directly to discuss possible discounts and arrangements.
You can negotiate bulk purchase details with the seller through the messaging feature on the product listing page.

patterns: How do I delete my account?
Can I remove my account?
I want to close my account
How can I deactivate my account?
responses: To delete your account, please go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Delete Account'. If you need assistance, contact support.
You can deactivate your account by visiting 'Account Settings' and choosing 'Delete Account'. For further help, reach out to our support team.

patterns: How can I reactivate my account?
I want to reopen my closed account
Can I get my account back?
How do I restore my account?
responses: To reactivate your account, please contact our support team with your account details.
You can restore your account by reaching out to our support team. Provide your account information for assistance.

patterns: How do I add items to my wishlist?
Can I save products for later?
How do I use the wishlist feature?
I want to save items to my wishlist
responses: To add items to your wishlist, click the 'Add to Wishlist' button on the product listing page.
You can save products for later by using the 'Add to Wishlist' feature found on each product's page.

patterns: How do I report an issue with a product?
Where can I report a seller?
How do I report a problem?
I need to report a faulty product
responses: To report an issue, go to the product listing page and click 'Report'. Provide details of the problem in the form.
If you need to report a seller or product, use the 'Report' button on the product page and fill out the necessary information.

patterns: Are there any upcoming campus events?
What events are happening on campus?
Is there a schedule for campus events?
How can I find out about campus activities?
responses: You can find information about upcoming campus events in the 'Events' section of our website.
Check out the 'Events' page on our site for details about upcoming campus activities and events.

patterns: Are there any current promotions?
Do you have any discounts?
What are the latest deals?
Are there any special offers?
responses: You can view current promotions and discounts on our 'Promotions' page.
Check our 'Promotions' section for the latest deals and special offers.

patterns: Is there any support for students?
What kind of student support is available?
How can students get help?
Are there resources for student support?
responses: We offer various support services for students. Visit the 'Student Support' section on our website for more information.
Students can find resources and assistance in the 'Student Support' area of our site.

patterns: How do I rate a seller?
Can I leave a review for the seller?
How do I provide feedback on a seller?
I want to rate my seller
responses: To rate a seller, go to the completed order page and click 'Rate Seller'. You can leave a review and rating there.
You can provide feedback on a seller by visiting the order details page and selecting 'Rate Seller'.

patterns: How do I rate a buyer?
Can I leave a review for the buyer?
How do I provide feedback on a buyer?
I want to rate my buyer
responses: To rate a buyer, go to the completed order page and click 'Rate Buyer'. You can leave a review and rating there.
You can provide feedback on a buyer by visiting the order details page and selecting 'Rate Buyer'.

patterns: How do I view my transaction history?
Can I see my past orders?
Where can I find my purchase history?
I want to check my transaction records
responses: You can view your transaction history by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section.
To see your past orders, go to 'My Orders' in your account dashboard.

patterns: How do I reset my password?
I forgot my password, what do I do?
Can I change my password?
I need to reset my password
responses: To reset your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.
You can change your password by selecting 'Forgot Password' on the login page and following the steps.
